Container.Name: EPlusTV
Container.Overview:
This takes ESPN, ESPN+, FOX Sports, Paramount+, MSG+, NFL+, B1G+, NESN, Mountain West, FloSports, CBS Sports, or MLB.tv programming and transforms it into a "live TV" experience with virtual linear channels. It will discover what is on, and generate a schedule of channels that will give you M3U and XMLTV files that you can import into something like Jellyfin or ChannelsDVR.
=== Notes === * This was not made for pirating streams. This is made for using your own credentials and have a different presentation than the ESPN, FOX Sports, and MLB.tv apps currently provide. * The Mouse might not like it and it could be taken down at any minute. Enjoy it while it lasts. ¯\\(ツ)/¯

Config.Name: Start Channel
Config.Description: If nothing is input, it will default to Channel 1.

Config.Name: Number of Channels
Config.Description: How many channels to create? This is dependent on the networks you are using. A good number to start with is > 200 if you are using ESPN+.

Config.Name: Base URL
Config.Description: If using a reverse proxy, m3u will be generated with this uri base.
